name: Atelier Meruru - Merururinsu Rēde Aruzu メルルリンス・レーデ・アールズ LoRA
description:
Atelier Meruru - Merururinsu Rēde Aruzu メルルリンス・レーデ・アールズ LoRA

Trained based on official art books & in-game screenshots.

Recommended CFG: 5-6

Recommended Weight: 0.8-1

Recommended prompt: crown, long hair, bow, skirt, red bow, bloomers, cape, breasts, flower, dress, pleated skirt, cleavage, long sleeves, braid,

This Lora model is one of the more difficult ones I have ever made, mainly because Meruru's training set is harder to find and not particularly good quality. I tried to make Meruru's clothes better, but there were always missing details. This problem is harder to solve, and I would like to find clearer and more detailed pictures of Meruru's clothes if possible. I used to draw Meruru's short manga, and at that time I found it difficult to draw the details of her clothes. Now it's obvious that this problem appears in AI learning.

But anyway, this LoRA can at least generate this role, although it is not stable enough. Maybe you need to keep generating to find a better seed.

modelVersions.name: v1c
modelVersions.description:
Second version

Improvement:

  1. better cape generation

  2. better structure

  3. more stable details, including clothes and crown

Existing problem:

  1. sometimes incorrect wavy hair

modelVersions.name: v1atest
modelVersions.description:
First version:

Existing problem:

  1. incorrect multiple arms

  2. missing cape and clothes detail

  3. hard to generate some poses

  4. incorrect floating hair (this is because Meruru in-game 3D model has a really weird hair)

Will I fix them? May be yes may be no. Depends on can I find enough new training set images.
